alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued October 09 at 3:48AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive lake effect rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central New York, including the following county, Jefferson. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in minor flooding of poor drainage and urban areas, and high water in small streams and creeks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A band of heavy lake effect rain will move north across Jefferson County early this morning, producing additional rainfall amounts of up to 1 inch. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
